__e: So maybe the pain's over now. Unless you brought him more. Have you?
You think you're a big man, but you and I both know what you are.
Takes a big man not to go to another man's office - and punch him in the face.
Once upon a time... there was a great tree... and a great wind.
One strong wind and all is gone.
Wow, it must have been a pretty strong wind.
Yes, his father may be a great man, but... [sighing]
Oh, well, you know, he's a strong kid, And I'm glad I got a chance to meet him.
He wanted everyone to know what a good, strong boy his son would grow up to be.
What we need is a good, strong name, like a team. Something like...
Max is a strong name, what do you think?
